title: CFATF Public Statements | British Virgin Islands Financial Services Commission
content_html:
• CFATF Public Statement on Sint Maarten, 11 December 2020
  • High-Risk Jurisdictions subject to a Call for Action – 21 February 2020Public Statement on Sint Maarten approved by Round Robin on July 28th, 2020
  • CFATF Public Statement on Sint Maarten at L Plenary St. Johns, Antigua and Barbuda, November 27th,2019
  • Public Statement and Notice of exiting the Follow-up process May 2018
  • Public Statement and Notice of exiting the Follow-up process November 2017
  • Post Plenary Public Statement and Notice of exiting the follow-up process May 2017
  • Public Statement and Notice of exiting the follow-up process, XLV Plenary Meeting, May 2017
  • CFATF Public Statement on Haiti, Suriname and Guyana at XLIV Plenary, Providenciales, Turks and Caicos, November 9th, 2016
  • Public Statement on Haiti and Suriname in CFATF XLIII Plenary, Jamaica, June 2016
  • CFATF Public Statement, Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago, November 2015
content_text:
CFATF Public Statement on Sint Maarten, 11 December 2020
High-Risk Jurisdictions subject to a Call for Action – 21 February 2020Public Statement on Sint Maarten approved by Round Robin on July 28th, 2020
